pr_title: SONARJAVA-3405 Rule S5863: Assertions should not compare an object to itself

timeline.message: SONARJAVA-3405 Rule S5863: Assertions should not compare an object to itself
SONARJAVA-3405 Rule S5863: Assertions should not compare an object to itself

timeline.bodyText: You should add a second consecutive assertThat, to be sure to test that there is no issue.
timeline.author: quentin-jaquier-sonarsource

replies.bodyText: 😖 I just repeat 10 times in my head MAKE YOUR TEST FAIL FIRST!
replies.author: alban-auzeill

timeline.bodyText: You are never testing secondary locations in any tests.
timeline.author: quentin-jaquier-sonarsource

timeline.bodyText: I don't think this is a wise use of AbstractMethodDetection, you end up calling many matchers twice. I would prefer to directly go for an IssuableSubscriptionVisitor.
timeline.author: quentin-jaquier-sonarsource

replies.bodyText: Good advice, I don't need to visit NEW_CLASS and METHOD_REFERENCE, and it's easier.
replies.author: alban-auzeill

timeline.bodyText:
We should use @VisibleForTesting here.
Same for classSymbolOfTheUnitTest.
timeline.author: quentin-jaquier-sonarsource
quentin-jaquier-sonarsource

timeline.message: SONARJAVA-3402 share "alwaysReturnSameValue" in "ExpressionsHelper" and support constructors
Fix from review, remove false-positives based on unit test names instead of package names
